title: Dobbs: Longer term trends link better with global economy
itunes:title: Dobbs: Longer term trends link better with global economy
description:
McKinsey & Co's Richard Dobbs discusses why investors need to lower their expectations. He speaks with David Gura on Bloomberg Surveillance.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
